description: L-shaped layout with two perpendicular sections. Ideal for kitchens with multiple work zones.
geometry_definition: {"floor": {"type": "polygon", "vertices": [[0, 0], [600, 0], [600, 300], [300, 300], [300, 400], [0, 400]], "elevation": 0}, "walls": [{"id": "wall-1", "end": [600, 0], "start": [0, 0], "height": 240, "has_door": false, "material": "default", "thickness": 15, "has_window": false, "elevation_view": "front"}, {"id": "wall-2", "end": [600, 300], "start": [600, 0], "height": 240, "has_door": false, "material": "default", "thickness": 15, "has_window": false, "elevation_view": "right"}, {"id": "wall-3", "end": [300, 300], "start": [600, 300], "height": 240, "has_door": false, "material": "default", "thickness": 15, "has_window": false, "elevation_view": "back"}, {"id": "wall-4", "end": [300, 400], "start": [300, 300], "height": 240, "has_door": false, "material": "default", "thickness": 15, "has_window": false, "elevation_view": "left"}, {"id": "wall-5", "end": [0, 400], "start": [300, 400], "height": 240, "has_door": false, "material": "default", "thickness": 15, "has_window": false, "elevation_view": "left"}, {"id": "wall-6", "end": [0, 0], "start": [0, 400], "height": 240, "has_door": false, "material": "default", "thickness": 15, "has_window": false, "elevation_view": "front"}], "ceiling": {"type": "polygon", "height": 240, "vertices": [[0, 0], [600, 0], [600, 300], [300, 300], [300, 400], [0, 400]], "elevation": 240}, "metadata": {"complexity": "moderate", "suggested_uses": ["kitchen", "living-room"], "total_floor_area": 210000, "total_wall_length": 2200}, "shape_type": "l-shape", "bounding_box": {"max_x": 600, "max_y": 400, "min_x": 0, "min_y": 0}}

description: Traditional rectangular room shape. This is the default room type.
Standard rectangular room. Easy to work with and suitable for most layouts.

description: L-shaped room with main section and perpendicular extension. Perfect for open-plan kitchens or living areas.
parameter_config: {"configurable_params": [{"max": 1000, "min": 300, "name": "main_width", "step": 10, "type": "number", "unit": "cm", "label": "Main Section Width", "default": 600}, {"max": 800, "min": 300, "name": "main_depth", "step": 10, "type": "number", "unit": "cm", "label": "Main Section Depth", "default": 400}, {"max": 600, "min": 200, "name": "extension_width", "step": 10, "type": "number", "unit": "cm", "label": "Extension Width", "default": 300}, {"max": 400, "min": 200, "name": "extension_depth", "step": 10, "type": "number", "unit": "cm", "label": "Extension Depth", "default": 200}, {"max": 400, "min": 220, "name": "ceiling_height", "step": 10, "type": "number", "unit": "cm", "label": "Ceiling Height", "default": 250}]}

description: U-shaped room with central courtyard or opening. Ideal for wrap-around kitchens or horseshoe layouts.
parameter_config: {"configurable_params": [{"max": 1200, "min": 400, "name": "total_width", "step": 10, "type": "number", "unit": "cm", "label": "Total Width", "default": 800}, {"max": 1000, "min": 400, "name": "total_depth", "step": 10, "type": "number", "unit": "cm", "label": "Total Depth", "default": 600}, {"max": 400, "min": 150, "name": "arm_width", "step": 10, "type": "number", "unit": "cm", "label": "Arm Width", "default": 200}, {"max": 400, "min": 150, "name": "top_depth", "step": 10, "type": "number", "unit": "cm", "label": "Top Section Depth", "default": 200}, {"max": 400, "min": 220, "name": "ceiling_height", "step": 10, "type": "number", "unit": "cm", "label": "Ceiling Height", "default": 250}]}
